name: The Gardener Queen
description:
The Gardener Queen is a game jam project for Ludum Dare 44. The objective is to rack up as many points as possible by constructing buildings and killing enemies. You must spawn workers to build, but every worker spawned removes a life point from the queen.

There are three types of buildings:

- Heart (pink): These buildings will generate life for the Queen.

- Spawner (orange): These buildings will generate new workers.

- Turret (blue): These buildings will attack incoming enemies, be sure to place them in strategic locations.

Tips and tricks:
- Once a heart is fully grown, click on it to give the queen life

- You can use the keyboard for the bottom buttons (w)Add Worker, (b)Build, (c)Consume Workers
- Sometimes a run is just no good if you're not spawning any hearts or turrets, you can always run your life out and then try again
